data.name: Fear Of The Darkness
data.detailed_description:
General description

Fear Of The Darkness is a narrative psychologic game that will push you to face the phobias of some reckless patients, being treated by an enigmatic doctor.
Avoid to get overwhelmed by the patient's emotional burden, step out of the Darkness and explore the various corners of Truth.

Setting

The main hub of the game is a strange room, where everything changes, pay attention, you can discover a lot about the character's stories, unlock new powers, relax, look around and continue the journey.

Gameplay

Through the different game phases you will rummage through their rarefied memories, looking for Brightness.

There are 4 patient's stories, each with their peculiar gameplay:
- a platform phase when you need to jump carefully through the paths
- a little scary phase when you see something or someone in the dark that isn't real
- a fast-paced phase when you need to run and escape from something
- a puzzle game phase when you need to use your skills to solve it

Final Advise

Usually the Brightness could help you...

data.short_description: Fear Of The Darkness is a narrative psychologic game that will push you to face the phobias of some patients. Through different game phases you will look for Brightness. Be careful not to get overwhelmed by their emotional burden, step out of the Darkness and explore the various corners of Truth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or above
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible with 2 GB video RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
